recipesJson.name: Sicilian Cannoli
recipesJson.author: vagdal
recipesJson.description:
Biscuit INW & Cookie FA: For the role of the bold and crunchy cannoli shell.

NY Cheesecake CAP & Bavarian Cream: For the creamy part of cannoli.

Meringue FA & Vienna Cream FA: Meringue is added to enhance the shell of cannoli with a hint of sugar. Vienna Cream is to help blend the crunchy shell with the creams.

Vanilla Custard CAP: is added for a hint of vanilla.

You can add 0.2% of cap super sweet. (optional)

reviews.text: Really good for me on day 10 and beyond.  Before that I got some off and sour notes. Afterwards you get that delicious and light fried buttery bakery with the vanilla cream inside. I am upset that I only made a 30ml because I don't know how long it will last.

Just made a 30ml yesterday evening. Love the ingredients. Canâ€™t wait ro vape this. My rating in a couple weeks. 
Thanks for sharing.
